xxl.core.util.reflect
Class Reflections

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.util.reflect.Reflections

public class Reflections
extends Object

This class provides some static methods which make heavily use of the Java reflection mechanism.

Method Summary
static void callMainMethod(Class cl, String[] args)
          Calls the main method of a class cl with a given paramter array.
static Object convertStringToDifferentType(String s, Class type)
          Converts a given String into a type which is given by its class object.
static boolean convertStringToDifferentTypeSupported(Class type)
          Determines if the type is supported by the convertStringToDifferentType method above.
static Function getNumberTypeConversionFunction(Class returnClass)
          Returns a function which converts Number types into the desired Wrapper class type, which is given by returnClass.
static boolean isIntegralType(Class clv)
          Returns true iff the given class is a integral number type.
static boolean isRealType(Class clv)
          Returns true iff the given class is a real number type.
static void setStaticFields(Map map, Class cl)
          Sets the static fields of a class cl with values which are given by a map.
static Cursor typedArrayCursor(Object valuesArray)
          Returns a Cursor iterating over the elements of the array.

Method Detail

convertStringToDifferentType

public static Object convertStringToDifferentType(String s,
                                                  Class type)
Converts a given String into a type which is given by its class object.

Parameters:
s - String containing a value.
type - Class object of the desired return type.
Returns:
the value parsed from the String.

convertStringToDifferentTypeSupported

public static boolean convertStringToDifferentTypeSupported(Class type)
Determines if the type is supported by the convertStringToDifferentType method above.

Parameters:
type - Class object of the desired return type.
Returns:
true iff the type is supported.

setStaticFields

public static void setStaticFields(Map map,
                                   Class cl)
Sets the static fields of a class cl with values which are given by a map.

Parameters:
map - Map containing the values to be set.
cl - Given class.

getNumberTypeConversionFunction

public static Function getNumberTypeConversionFunction(Class returnClass)
Returns a function which converts Number types into the desired Wrapper class type, which is given by returnClass.

Parameters:
returnClass - Desired return Class. If a primitive class is given, then also the associated wrapper class is used.
Returns:
The conversion function.

callMainMethod

Calls the main method of a class cl with a given paramter array.

Parameters:

args - String array with parameters for the main method.

typedArrayCursor

public static Cursor typedArrayCursor(Object valuesArray)
Returns a Cursor iterating over the elements of the array. This method is applicable for all kinds of arrays.

Parameters:
valuesArray - Array of arbitrary base type.
Returns:
Cursor iterating over the elements of the array.
